trans-unit.source: Represents an individual item of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is used in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether this item is highlighted.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The keyboard shortcut for the control.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.KeyTip*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse pointer is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse pointer is over it.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.MouseOverBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when the mouse pointer is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when the mouse pointer is over it.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.MouseOverBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
Contains data about the activation.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true` when this control gets keyboard focus.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
The event data.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
Contains data about the activation.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.

This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> properties to `false` when this control loses keyboard focus.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event.

This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> properties to `false` when the mouse pointer leaves this control.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true`.
If the mouse button is pressed, it also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `true`.

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `false` when the left mouse button is released over this control.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
This method manages the focus and highlighting of the gallery item when the mouse moves over it.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Selected"></xref> routed event.
This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
The event data.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is pressed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is pressed.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBackground*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is pressed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is pressed.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*> property of the item changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Selected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipDescription*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The descriptive text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipFooterDescription*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipFooterImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the footer of the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipFooterTitle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The image to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipImageSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the title text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
> [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The title text to display in the ToolTip.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.ToolTipTitle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*> property of the item changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
